trans-unit.source: Provides methods to add work to a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para adicionar trabalho a um lote de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Services use this interface to add pending work to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Serviços de usam essa interface para adicionar trabalho para pendente de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.

trans-unit.source: An object on which work is to be performed.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto no qual o trabalho deverá ser executada.

trans-unit.source: Adds a pending work item to a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um item de trabalho pendente para um lote de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to add pending work items to a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Este método é usado para adicionar itens de trabalho pendente para um lote de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The `workItem` object added to the batch is associated with `work`, an object that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface.
trans-unit.target: O `workItem` objeto adicionado ao lote está associado `work`, um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface.

trans-unit.source: Methods provided by this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> object will be called to handle the eventual commit of the `workItem`.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos fornecidos por esse <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> objeto será chamado para manipular a confirmação final do `workItem`.

trans-unit.source: Services use this method to add pending work to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Serviços de usam esse método para adicionar trabalho para pendente de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
